product.name: 21.5 IN Touchscreen Monitor Digital Signage 2K Industrial Monter Digital Calendar Wall-Plug & Play Auto Play, Smart Split Screen Play, 7/24 Timer Switch, CMS Management, HD-MI/USB/WiFi/Android System
product.bullet_points:
• 【21.5-inch LCD Touch Screen HD Vision】RIXZSIW has 1920*1080 HD screen resolution, 10-point capacitive touch (PCAP), 350nits brightness and 1200:1 high contrast ratio, presenting a clear, vivid picture with accurate reproduction of both colors and details to meet the visual needs of various scenarios.
• 【Powerful system performance】RIXZSIW is equipped with Android 9.0 system, 2+16GB storage combination, running smoothly, and you can freely download all kinds of applications.
• 【Multi-functional Support】Support U disk plug-and-play and copy playback, convenient and fast file sharing; support HDMI input source display, easy to connect to a variety of devices; also support the installation of our CMS real-time information distribution system control, to meet the needs of diversified information display.
• 【Commercial Design】Support 7*24 hours of commercial use, durable, stable and reliable, is the ideal choice for commercial display, public area information dissemination and other scenarios; at the same time, support timer on/off settings, energy saving and worry-free.
• 【Convenient Installation】Support wall-mounted, standing, hanging, embedded and other installation methods, and is equipped with a wall mounting bracket, easy and convenient to install, can be installed according to your space layout and use of the demand for flexible installation, space-saving, enhance the display effect.
• We have the most professional manufacturer: Marvel Technology CO., LTD. Product Model:MWE-CS02
features: 【21.5-inch LCD Touch Screen HD Vision】RIXZSIW has 1920*1080 HD screen resolution, 10-point capacitive touch (PCAP), 350nits brightness and 1200:1 high contrast ratio, presenting a clear, vivid picture with accurate reproduction of both colors and details to meet the visual needs of various scenarios.
